mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.batch_no AS "batchNo", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.produce_date AS "produceDate"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_batch( id, batch_no, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag, produce_date ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{batchNo}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag}, #{produceDate} )
mapper.update: UPDATE t_batch SET batch_no = #{batchNo}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks}, produce_date = #{produceDate} WHERE id = #{id}
